# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value for you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am pleased to extend this exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the chance to purchase this exceptional item at a special price of $1,350,000. This offer represents a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic value to you and my asking price, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. I trust that this proposal will be favorable to you, allowing you to secure this remarkable asset without exceeding your budget significantly. Should you require any additional information or wish to discuss the details further, please do not hesitate to contact me. I look forward to the possibility of working together to make this acquisition a reality. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,350,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,350,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
